author: zwoop
msg: TS-880 Major performance problem with second request on same keep-alive connection
Note that this is only a partial solution, for a future release, we should
try to use the optimal solution of migrating the VConns across EThreads.
It is just too risky right now. I'll file a separate bug for that.

author: dblevins
msg: Rework part of the CDI integration that inappropriately passed thread state in the BeanContext map -- not thread safe
